column1: Baby Barnaby's////We have spent a lot of time in Houston bouncing in between breakfast spots.  Among our efforts have been Empire Cafe (reputed to be excellent
column4: Benjy's (way too much food for breakfast)
column7: is the real article.  Even with the often interminable waits
column8: the excellent service and the better than excellent food pay off in the end.  I am especially enamored with the biscuits currently
column9: though gorging myself on any of the food is guaranteed to brighten up my day.  Special fun was dining at gay-friendly Barnaby's the day after New York legalized same sex marriage -- even this heterosexual couple felt part of the fun.
